text: Great service! Great food!  Great times. Love the option of eating on the deck. Good selections of brews.

Used to be a great spot with quality food.  I don't know what has happened.  The past two times we had a Reuben with meat that tasted "bad".  The shrimp were micro and fishy with the shrimp dish.  Unfortunate because it is a clean bar with a nice outside patio.
Everything was great   Happy hour apps and drinks were a sweet deal. Service was spot on !!  Def on the go back to list
